message.body: Hey lady, I'm trying to figure out a time to visit people in lanc, when are your best nights for doin stuff?
My schedule is seriously all over the place. My shifts range from 530 am-2 to 4-1230 in the am. It's the pits! My days off are usually Sunday/Monday...bu
t that varies also. I can work you in whenever though. I'm down with morning hang out! Let me know!!
Oh man that is terrible! Both shifts are bummers
I love morning handouts. Specially when there are mimosas
Also, Dan ###### wrote me on fb. He mentioned our apt on duke street, yikes!
This week I'm bankers hours...8-430 everyday. Which probably means that next week I'm totally fucked...ha. I can adjust easily though. There are 5 people
in my department so switching is fairly easy.
Oh geez. In my head everyone has forgotten our duke street apt. and holy crap...Dan ######?!
Right?!? Do you ever see that guy? He said he and his wife (!!) live on Frederick, and he walks by our old place everyday
I kind of hate Facebook for those random interactions.
Something about that made me queasy... that there are people in this world whose only impression of me are from that window of time
Oh God.no I've never seen him. That i know of...Dodd i tell you Jon ##### friended me?
I know!!
Hahahaha..that is so funny! Is he still cute?
Meh...not the Adonis i had remembered but he aiight.
I remember him glowing.
read: still pretty cute. :-)
I think he used to have like...a sparky aura or something. To read my old journals he was definitely of some godly proportion.
I'm sure age killed some of his sparkle. It's easy to have a sparkle when you work at a skate shop and babes visit you all day
So Russell is getting married in a month. Went to the wedding shower today. Also Adam seems to think Man got married. For real.
Jesus. What the hell??
I wonder what that was like
He sent him a wedding gift and everything! I can never tell if he's joking or not. The girls name is Ambrosia and apparently Adam has met her.
Right, like is the gift part of the joke? So weird
Any other good gossip?
Um...i don't really talk to anyone. The friends i had around here are all gone or boring. Going to the lounge is terrible. That's the only place i see a
lot of familiar faces, but it's all awkward small talk. I avoid it. a lot of the cool kids got chubby...that's kind of funny. i think that's what happens
when you don't do anything but go to the same bar for ten years. That's me being really catty though.
I dunno...i think i shouldn't have come back here. I do enjoy my time with the fam. Adams and mine. But aside from family time i don't do much at all socially
Please tell me you have good gossip.
Hahaha..I'm glad all those fuckers got chubby. I don't have any gossip at all. I like don't or can't really talk to anyone from lanc. Sometimes mark texts me, but that's it.
Do you guys know what you are going to do? How long you are staying around there?
On fb I think it's kind of funny that all the bitchy younger girls just turned into wives/moms
I dunno. Adams into his trucking thing. Did you even know that is what he's doing? He works with Greg-Hawa's beau-doing shipping. Driving big trucks acro
ss the country. Perfect for him. He gets the travel in while i get to have s home base. I'm trying to get a bit of time in with the marriott. I'm applyin
g for a part time accounting position and I'll stay in my current dept part time. I think I'll get it. Then I'll kind of have a "career"...
I don't know how long we'll stay though. At least a year...we signed a lease.
I love Facebook. it is both terrible and sometimes a huge confidence boost!

Whoa that's nuts, he totally looks like a trucker. I'm so over PA. I just want to be done with school, it's fun but so mentally exhausting in so many ways. And I want to be in a place I want to make home
Yeah, Dan told me I looked "fantastic!" And I wanted to be like yeah that's because you are used to Lancaster people haha
Sucha bitch
Yeah, i feel ya!! We've talked about the northwest often, but sometimes i feel nervous about that because of man and Kaz living there.
Ha! It's true though! Lancaster is dumpy!
I can see that. They are kind of a powerful force when together. I keep thinking about that area too, but I don't know. I hope I'm not too cynical to live there
Ha! I know. There is that also. I'm used to my "no eye contact, mind your own biz, glass is sometimes empty, i ain't giving you change, get off my lawn"n
orth east- attitude.
I don't know if I'm ready for the easy going-ness of the Pacific northwest...I'm kind of hardened!
Ha ha
I hate trying to be funny in texts. It never comes out quite right. We should talk on the phone soon.I miss you girl.
I know me too. It's like my security shell. Maybe it's like a bad relationship, and once we were off the east coast, we would never look back?
I just want to live in warm weather, maybe a beach
Haha, no you are totally funny. I miss u too!
Do you still have your list? Or am i the only one who did that.. ?
He keeps texting me and talking about how great our old apartment was hash
I mean haha, but hash works too
I do have a list some where. It has a lot of random entries, like "girl at rave" haha
I should reference that
Oh God. Yeah the just kissing or just making out ones were the worst. All the nicknames.
He keeps texting you?!? Weird. I don't remember our place fondly at all. I don't REMEMBER most of it...
I know totally. He was like "why no love for that apartment? I have great memories" and I was like I have next to no memories
So true!
